A4.text: The Penny_fil was the world's first adhesive postage stamp used in a public postal system.

A5.text: It was first issued in the United Kingdom on 1 May 1840 but was not valid for use until 6 May.

A6.text: The 1840 Penny Black was issued in 1840.
